personal.name: Michael Oyesola
personal.tagline: Junior Service Delivery Manager | Aspirng Cybersecurity Professional also exploring Web & App Development

bio.intro: I'm a passionate and experienced IT professional with a deep focus on technology, cybersecurity, and creating solutions that make a difference. I bridge the gap between complex technical challenges and real-world business needs.

focus.title: Driving Innovation & User Experience
focus.description: Delivering practical, innovative IT solutions that enhance user satisfaction and align with business objectives.

focus.title: Strengthening Security & Performance
focus.description: Applying a security-first mindset to system design and support, with experience across government and commercial sectors.

focus.title: Solving Complex Problems
focus.description: Thriving on challenges in software development and system security to build robust and effective solutions.

bio.approach: I am a collaborative and self-motivated professional, committed to continuous learning. I'm currently advancing my skills through hands-on cybersecurity projects and certifications. When I'm not at my desk, I'm applying the same discipline and motivation to my love for sports and personal growth.
bio.closing: I am actively seeking opportunities to grow professionally and help strengthen your organization's IT capabilities.

experience.title: Service Delivery Manager (HMRC)
experience.description: SC Cleared. Managing daily operations of test environments for HMRC, ensuring high availability, reliability, and SLA compliance. Overseeing change control and incident handling, coordinating cross-functional teams for rapid resolution. Producing service delivery reports and testing performance metrics aligned with contractual and regulatory requirements. Chairing service reviews and improvement initiatives, advising stakeholders on testing performance, risk, and service enhancements. Streamlining reporting and process automation using Microsoft Power Platform. Leading monthly security calls, coordinating patching, vulnerability remediation, and configuration changes.

experience.title: Application Support Engineer & SME (MET Police)
experience.description: SC Cleared. Provided seamless 2LS & 3LS support for existing applications and solutions within MET Police internal systems. Conducted root cause analysis and implemented corrective actions to prevent incident recurrence. Facilitated knowledge transfer and onboarding for new staff members. Documented troubleshooting steps and resolution procedures for complex incidents. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to support deployments, updates, and process automation initiatives. Supported systems in both Windows and Linux environments, ensuring high availability and performance.

experience.title: Service Desk and Application Support Analyst
experience.description: Resolved client support tickets across hardware, applications, and network issues for over 1000+ users. Managed and documented incidents in ServiceNow and Freshservice, ensuring timely resolution and escalation. Delivered technical troubleshooting and root cause analysis to minimize recurring incidents. Collaborated with teams to maintain and update the support knowledge base. Provided training and mentorship to colleagues. Supported SAP Hybris, Microsoft Dynamics NAV, K3, and Manhattan SCALE platforms. Conducted SQL scripting, XML editing, and system monitoring to support integrations and transactions.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: Modern portfolio with Next.js 16, enterprise security (9.5/10), orbital parallax animations, and blog system

projects.title: Home Hacking Lab
projects.description: Turning my home setup into a hands-on CyberSec playground
